meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - It's Your Boy Grok Here!

Capes, the game that's got everyone donning their superhero capes (see what I did there?)! As a seasoned grok video game reviewer with witty humor (try not to blush, it's okay!), I'm here to give you the lowdown on this turn-based tactical combat extravaganza. So, buckle up and let's get this review flying!

First off, IGN says Capes is "clever and challenging" - yep, that's what I'm talking about! Watching those action figure-like characters combine their powers and supercharge their ultimate abilities is pure magic. It's like watching a superhero team-up in real life (minus the destruction of cities, of course). But, let's get to the good stuff: the combat. Stealth missions don't quite live up to their promise, but hey, they're mostly optional, right?

Now, Worth Playing chimes in with their praise, saying Capes is "just fun" - and I'm here for it! If you love XCOM but wanted your heroes to have more power from the get-go (like me!), then this game scratches that itch. The by-the-numbers plot might be a tad lacking, but the title's engaging enough to keep you invested in the next thrilling stage or exciting boss fight.

Vandal's review is still pending, but I'm guessing it'll be something like, "Capes: A-okay, but not totally." (Okay, maybe not exactly, but you get the idea!). And don't even get me started on GameStar - their quote's forthcoming, but I bet it'll be some sassy remark about balance quirks in the combat system.

PC Gamer agrees that Capes is one of the best turn-based strategy games out there, despite its awkward story. Meanwhile, The Games Machine praises Capes for being "fun, complex, and colourful" - exactly what we want in a game!

So, to summarize: Capes is an awesome game with clever combat mechanics, engaging gameplay, and some minor quibbles (which are mostly optional). If you love XCOM or just looking for a fun time, this game's got your back! Now if you'll excuse me, I've gotta go save the world from certain doom - Hippo Penny - out!
